text: aw kunuu khlqana yaezum wyustabead fi eqwlkm qbwlh llbeth, fallah taealaa qadir ealaa 'ieadtkm wbethkm, wahin taqum ealayhim alhujat fi qudrat allah ealaa albaeth wal'ihya' fasayaqulun -mnkryn-: man yrdduna 'iilaa alhayat baed almwt? qul lhm: yueidukum wyrjekm allah aladhi 'ansha'akum min aledm 'awal mrt, waeind smaehm hdha alradi fsyahuzzun rwwshm sakhryn mtejbyn wayaqulun -mstbedyn-: mataa yaqae hdha albeth? ql: hu qryb; fa'iina kl at qryb
